data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Zb6Jz1g5XggQ7kNvgEkREdM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB5CwLPXwGP6a71J_AW_TOTHMJKcEUGdu3V-kMtNfKLow&oe=6645EE9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kfC08eESjGAQ7kNvgFm1akW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBO4i4GqGhpAKedFGa1zom_r1FdwV2lBgNHTnEdm4yYGQ&oe=6645F824)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aX0vzNZwJj8Q7kNvgFr_wox&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC_SIekVSGRKs6TJTEFj3Ch6zCTE-9MS7BZLkkfFj9AWg&oe=6645DF87)

Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.
![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XxBRbTt9i50Q7kNvgHqDJQC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzkLlUXxlGQ1la-5gh2rxCkKUPxTG149RhoM-nb6zblg&oe=6645D266)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tBMCRAlIJRYQ7kNvgFRwa-P&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDFoCp2ISVHk5V19WOzV8zyNOeDfZ6Fo5fXyinSCOzqXA&oe=6645FED8)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ar87qMvq764Q7kNvgG-B-8q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD0s5-W5pNdORFeTltbg-16fdeG1hmGl6X7RI2Lt9ZKDw&oe=6645FB59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LWoYiC5TohwQ7kNvgEZmPZ0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC5lvF626gyxgx1tW5Pssaa0d2wwTAXqrfpfGIyoLTRbA&oe=6645E170)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s35cVZF04egQ7kNvgFIiXLk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgnsBCCpCfU7ldrV15Rzkz4ub7eo7AaxnoVFYIPDA5_A&oe=6645CBEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WcuBO1FYt18Q7kNvgF8Xl2A&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAFXuLbSmj1yOe_1KDrBUfv8-lpwyNqVUWLa0zKQLnOIA&oe=6645DF97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7E8C09n9z9sQ7kNvgE3d44y&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBVAXaiugpw227wYdXo44SEvdeOSzd7x5l0glegHfcp8A&oe=6645FB0C)
